channel.title: Think this is possible to use on a server?
channel.description: So, I've been on some RSCD servers. I thought it was pretty cool. I found something even cooler. There was a little sleeping bag. When you click on it, it keeps you from getting attacked and gives you a black screen and the get back to normal, you had to enter like "2 1 q r z". Anyone know if it is possible to put on a 317 Server?

item.title: Think this is possible to use on a server?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

If you know how to blacken the game screen, sendMessage and add something like when you use the “Withdraw” option in your bank and you enter your amount of items, it would be something along the lines of that.

**Oh, and first-click item.

Read full topic
item.source: Think this is possible to use on a server?
